e15190.utilities.fast_histogram.histo1d¶

e15190.utilities.fast_histogram.histo1d(x, range, bins, weights=None)¶

A wrapper function for fast_histogram.histogram1d()

Parameters

  • x (1D array-like) – Input data.

  • range (2-tuple or 2-list) – The lower and upper range of the bins.

  • bins (int) – The number of bins.

  • weights (array-like or None, default None) – Weights for each value in x.

Returns

bin_contents – The bin contents.

Return type

1D array of shape (bins, )
